To the chief Musician<S>5329</S>, A Psalm<S>4210</S> of David<S>1732</S>. The LORD<S>3068</S> hear<S>6030</S> thee in the day<S>3117</S> of trouble<S>6869</S>; the name<S>8034</S> of the God<S>430</S> of Jacob<S>3290</S> defend<S>7682</S> thee; <sup>defend: Heb. set thee on an high place</sup>
Send<S>7971</S> thee help<S>5828</S> from the sanctuary<S>6944</S>, and strengthen<S>5582</S> thee out of Zion<S>6726</S>; <sup>thee help: Heb. thy help</sup> <sup>strengthen: Heb. support</sup>
Remember<S>2142</S> all thy offerings<S>4503</S>, and accept<S>1878</S> thy burnt sacrifice<S>5930</S>; Selah<S>5542</S>. <sup>accept: Heb. turn to ashes: or, make fat</sup>
Grant<S>5414</S> thee according to thine own heart<S>3824</S>, and fulfil<S>4390</S> all thy counsel<S>6098</S>.
We will rejoice<S>7442</S> in thy salvation<S>3444</S>, and in the name<S>8034</S> of our God<S>430</S> we will set up our banners<S>1713</S>: the LORD<S>3068</S> fulfil<S>4390</S> all thy petitions<S>4862</S>.
Now know<S>3045</S> I that the LORD<S>3068</S> saveth<S>3467</S> his anointed<S>4899</S>; he will hear<S>6030</S> him from his holy<S>6944</S> heaven<S>8064</S> with the saving<S>3468</S> strength<S>1369</S> of his right hand<S>3225</S>. <sup>his holy: Heb. the heaven of his holiness</sup> <sup>with: Heb. by the strength of the salvation of</sup>
Some trust in chariots<S>7393</S>, and some in horses<S>5483</S>: but we will remember<S>2142</S> the name<S>8034</S> of the LORD<S>3068</S> our God<S>430</S>.
They are brought down<S>3766</S> and fallen<S>5307</S>: but we are risen<S>6965</S>, and stand upright<S>5749</S>.
Save<S>3467</S>, LORD<S>3068</S>: let the king<S>4428</S> hear<S>6030</S> us when<S>3117</S> we call<S>7121</S>.
